✅【High Quality Material】 Reusable utensils set with case are made of stainless steel which enhances the surface hardness, avoid the scratch on the flatware when using.

✅【Ergonomic Desgin】 This premium travel silverware set with case have a exquisite appearance, designed to provide a good grip for adults. Portable silverware set with case can be paired with any style of kitchen to meet the basic dining requirements of everyone.

✅【Wide Application】 Travel cutlery set with case is small in size and light in weight, making it easy to carry around. Portable utensils set with case in a Transparency case is a indispensable for daily, office workers, students, camping outdoor cooking, hiking, picnic, home travel and eating on the go.

✅【What You Get】 4PCS silver utensil set include 1 X knife , 1 X fork, 1 X spoon, 1 X Transparency case. We provide lifetime warranty and a 60-day refund or replacement for no reason. Your satisfaction is our highest priority.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: So nice to put in lunch bag to go

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars ## Ditch the Disposables: A Review of the 4PCS Premium Travel Utensils Set with Case
reviews.reviewText: Packing lunches and taking meals on the go often means relying on wasteful plastic utensils. But what if there was a stylish and sustainable solution? Enter the 4PCS Premium Travel Utensils Set with Case from Lengnoyp. But does it deliver convenience and eco-friendliness without sacrificing quality? Let's dig in!**Stainless Steel Savvy:*** **Built to Last:** Made from high-quality stainless steel, these utensils feel sturdy and substantial, unlike flimsy plastic options. They're also rust-resistant, ensuring they'll be your mealtime companions for years to come.* **Easy on the Planet:** Ditch the disposables! This reusable set helps reduce waste and your environmental footprint, one lunchbox at a time. Feel good about making a sustainable choice.**Portable Perfection:*** **Compact & Convenient:** The included carrying case keeps your utensils neatly organized and protects them from getting dirty in your bag. Plus, its small size makes it easy to toss in any backpack or purse.* **Lunchbox Ready:** The fork, spoon, and knife are the perfect size for lunchboxes, picnics, or even airplane meals. No more struggling with oversized or awkward utensils.**Aesthetics & Extras:*** **Sleek & Stylish:** The silver finish adds a touch of sophistication to your mealtime routine, whether you're dining at the office or enjoying a park picnic.* **Dishwasher Safe:** Cleaning up is a breeze! Toss them in the dishwasher for effortless post-meal tidying.**Things to Consider:*** **Limited Options:** This set only includes a fork, spoon, and knife. If you need additional utensils like chopsticks or straws, you might need to look elsewhere.* **Not Leakproof:** The case doesn't create a completely sealed environment, so be mindful of packing with wet or saucy foods.**The Verdict:**The 4PCS Premium Travel Utensils Set with Case by Lengnoyp offers a stylish and sustainable solution for on-the-go meals. The high-quality stainless steel construction, compact carrying case, and dishwasher-safe design make them convenient and eco-friendly companions. However, if you need more utensils or leakproof storage, you might want to consider other options.**Who would love it:*** Eco-conscious individuals who want to reduce their plastic waste.* Professionals who frequently pack lunches or eat on the go.* Travelers who appreciate lightweight and portable dining solutions.**Who might want to consider other options:*** Users who need a wider variety of utensils (e.g., chopsticks, straws).* Individuals who require leakproof storage for wet or saucy foods.Ultimately, the 4PCS Premium Travel Utensils Set with Case is a well-made and stylish option for those seeking a sustainable and convenient way to enjoy meals on the go. Consider your specific needs and preferences before deciding if this set deserves a place in your bag.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars What you'd Expect
reviews.reviewText: So not much to say about this item. What you see is exactly what you get. A spoon, knife, and a fork encased in a small plastic case. That's it. The utensils themselves are not overly huge but they're not small either. They're decent sized.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars For the price, it offers a lot
reviews.reviewText: I travel a lot. Because I am on a special diet, it is often hard to get restaurant food I can eat, but I can usually buy fruit, bread, hummus, yoghurt, so on. I hate the plastic flatware that comes with fast food, so I bought these. The utensils look pretty, and they are in a very useful box that is easy to drop in a purse when I am driving or put in my checkin luggage if flying.This stainless-steel set is really small, but for spreading stuff on bread, eating yogurt or ice-cream the knife, fork, and spoon it is fine. I tried cutting an apple with the knife; it was a real struggle because the knife doesn’t have much of a serrated edge. Also because the handle edges are squared off, putting pressure on the knife hurt my fingers. I wasn’t able to peel the apple at all. That was a disappointment.On the whole I am glad to have this set, but I will need to find a better knife for cutting hard food.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars great travel utensil set for the money
reviews.reviewText: The product arrived as described, with 1 of each: fork, knife, spoon, and a plastic case. The case is semi-transparent as shown in the picture. It is somewhat sturdy but it's not a hard case. Nice feature about the case is that it has vent holes to keep everything dry. Also, the case is roomy enough to hold the 3 pieces and I can see it hold twice as much. The utensils themselves appear to be of decent quality (not high) and should function as intended. Although this is marketed for travel, the utensils are of good size and you should be able to use them comfortably as a full-sized. I have used some other travel utensils and I felt like I sacrificed useability with convenience of travel. Overall, this is a good set of travel utensils for any food/cuisine on your travel. The only thing I would add is a pair of chopsticks in case you want to try Chinese food (be sure the length do on exceed 180mm / 7 inches to fit the case).
